arts.ttl: Boga’s solo effort gives Nice 1-0 win over Nantes in French league
arts.sum: Forward Jérémie Boga scored his second goal of the season to secure a 1-0 win for Nice against Nantes in the French league on Saturday. Back into action following the international break, Nice put on a convincing display and created several good chances during the first half but could not find a way past Auxerre goalkeeper Anthony Lopes, who celebrated his 400th match in the French topflight.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 1-0 Nantes: Franck Haise’s side return to winning ways
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 4, 13/09/25 OGC Nice returned to winning ways thanks to a goal from Jérémie Boga, which was enough to see off FC Nantes (1-0). The Match …

arts.ttl: Nantes predicted XI v OGC Nice: Matthis Abline returns to line-up
arts.sum: Matthis Abline, despite being FC Nantes’ most important player, has spent the start of the season playing a bit-part role. The France youth international has often come off the bench.…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Nantes: Dante and Jonathan Clauss to return
arts.sum: Franck Haise will welcome back several players, while he may also hand out a couple of debuts as OGC Nice welcome FC Nantes at the Allianz Riviera on Saturday afternoon. …
